params.category: The category for which this allowance applies.
params.nft: The NFT contract for which this allowance applies.

returns.allowedAddresses: The addresses allowed to post. Returns empty if all addresses are allowed.
returns.maximumTotalSupply: The max total supply of NFTs that can be made available when minting. Leave as 0 for max.
returns.minimumPrice: The minimum price that a poster must pay to record a new NFT.
returns.minimumTotalSupply: The minimum total number of available tokens that a minter must set to record a new NFT.

params.allowedPosts: An array of criteria for allowed posts.
params.projectId: The ID of the project having its publishing allowances set.

params.controller: The controller that directs the projects being posted to.
params.feeProjectId: The ID of the project to which fees will be routed.

mintFrom(uint256,(bytes32,uint32,uint88,.details: A fee is taken into the appropriate treasury.

params.additionalPayMetadata: Metadata bytes that should be included in the pay function's metadata. This prepends the payload needed for NFT creation.
params.feeBeneficiary: The beneficiary of the fee project's token.
params.feeMetadata: The metadata to send alongside the fee payment.
params.nftBeneficiary: The beneficiary of the NFT mints.
params.posts: An array of posts that should be published as NFTs to the specified project.
params.projectId: The ID of the project to which the NFT should be added.

params.encodedIPFSUris: The URIs to get tiers of.
params.nft: The NFT from which to get tiers.
params.projectId: The ID of the project from which the tiers are being sought.

returns.tiers: The tiers that correspond to the provided encoded IPFS URIs. If there's no tier yet, an empty tier is returned.

CONTROLLER().notice: The controller that directs the projects being posted to.

FEE_DIVISOR().notice: The divisor that describes the fee that should be taken.

FEE_PROJECT_ID().notice: The ID of the project to which fees will be routed.

allowanceFor(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Post allowances for a particular category on a particular NFT.

configurePostingCriteriaFor(uint256,(add.notice: Project owners can set the allowed criteria for publishing a new NFT to their project.

mintFrom(uint256,(bytes32,uint32,uint88,.notice: Publish an NFT to become mintable, and mint a first copy.

tierIdForEncodedIPFSUriOf(uint256,bytes3.notice: The ID of the tier that an IPFS metadata has been saved to.

tiersFor(uint256,address,bytes32[]).notice: Get the tiers for the provided encoded IPFS URIs.

documentation.text:
@notice The divisor that describes the fee that should be taken.
 @dev This is equal to 100 divided by the fee percent.
@notice The controller that directs the projects being posted to.
@notice The ID of the project to which fees will be routed.

documentation.text: @notice A contract that facilitates the permissioned publishing of NFT posts to a Juicebox project.
